message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I'm willing to sell it to you for $9,000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $12,000. I'm confident you'll love it!
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm hoping to get a better deal.  I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product. This is still a fair price for both of us, considering your value and my budget.

Hi Bob, I understand your offer is a good one, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $9,500. This is still a great deal for you, considering the product's value to you is $12,000. Let me know if this is something you're interested in.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but I'm still hoping to get closer to $8,500. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. This is a fair compromise and a good deal for both of us.

Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking to get closer to your target price. I'm willing to make one more concession and sell the product to you for $9,200. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value to me is $8,000. Let me know if this is something you're interested in.
